mods.abstract: Dan Thompson, chairman for alumni homecoming activities, invited Alumni to Christian Brothers College's Annual Homecoming. Two basketball games - Alums v Freshmen, and CBC's varsity team v MacMurray College - were to be held in the afternoon, and followed by an informal meeting and dinner-dance.
